SEO.indexDesc: Portfolio of Michiel Leunens, photographer, developer and filmmaker. Michiel is a Belgian computer sciences student with a passion for technology and pictures.
SEO.aboutDesc: More information regarding Michiel Leunens, Leunes Media. Skillset, curriculum vitae, personal timeline.
SEO.photoDesc: Some shots taken by Michiel Leunens, Leunes Media. Michiel shoots events, products, landscapes, weddings, corporations and more.
SEO.devDesc: Web and mobile projects made by Michiel Leunens, Leunes Media
SEO.filmDesc: Videos made by Michiel Leunens, Leunes Media. Videos categories range from aftermovies and events to corporate. Or just plain, fun stuff.
SEO.socialsDesc: Socials of Leunes Media. Visit his Facebook, Instagram, Github and more.
SEO.contactDesc: Contact Michiel Leunens, Leunes Media, for more information. Leave a message behind!

index.photoContent: From moody landscapes to atmospheric images of events and parties. Weddings, portraits, products... I do them all! The feeling of capturing a moment, that's what I do it for.
index.devContent: Graduated as an Computer Sciences Engineer, I like to focus on developing web and mobile applications. But not without my coffee!
index.filmContent: Aftermovie? Music video? Corporate event? Your search is at an end. Team up with someone who has been playing with Adobe After Effects since he was 11 years old!

about.subtitle: My name is Michiel Leunens.
about.title: I'm a professional photographer, developer, filmmaker and everything in-between.
about.content: Welcome to my website! If we've already met: glad to see you again! If not, well then, let me introduce myself. I'm 21 years old and currently studying Computer Sciences at the University of Ghent. While my studies focus on becoming a full-stack developer, I also strive to become a great photographer and filmmaker. That's why I founded Leunes Media, so I can do both. Let's work together!
about.knowledge: I have an extensive knowledge of
about.footnote: *not to forget basic knowledge of many other frameworks/libraries/software/etc
